titleStmt.title: The northern lasse a comoedie. As it hath beene often acted with good applause, at the Globe, and Black-Fryers. By his Maiesties Servants. VVritten by Richard Brome.
titleStmt.author: Brome, Richard, d. 1652?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Mathevves, and are to be sold by Nicholas Vavasour, dwelling at the little south dore of St. Pauls Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the little south dore of St. Pauls Church
